education.institution: State Islamic University of Imam Bonjol Padang
education.description: Relevant Coursework: Data structures, algorithms, software engineering, databases, and UI/UX design.

experiences.description: Junior Frontend Developer at CodeAtHome — added features, fixed bugs, and followed clean code practices with regular code reviews.

experiences.institution: PT Astra International Tbk - TSO Auto2000
experiences.description:
As a Web Developer Intern, I developed a dynamic website for Toyota Labuhanbatu using Spreadsheet API integration, allowing non-technical staff to easily manage content such as text and images. I also built an AI-powered car recommendation feature based on user preferences.
Additionally, I developed ReminderApp with Supabase for Toyota Rantauprapat — a web-based reminder system with role-based access for admins and users, automated tracking of STNK and BPKB expiration dates, and complete CRUD functionality for product data and user profiles.
